description: This file contains a test suite for the GraphCanvas React component, specifically testing drop behavior when dropping on a selected site node. It sets up a mock store, renders the component, and verifies that no errors occur during a drop operation simulation.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for GraphCanvas drop behavior.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines an individual test case to check drop behavior does not throw errors.
